org.foxlabs.validation.constraint

Class IllegalCharsetConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.foxlabs.validation.AbstractValidation<V>
      • org.foxlabs.validation.constraint.CheckConstraint<String>
        • org.foxlabs.validation.constraint.IllegalCharsetConstraint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constraint<String>, Validation<String>

    public class IllegalCharsetConstraint
extends CheckConstraint<String>
    This class provides CheckConstraint implementation that checks whether a string not contains disallowed characters.
    Author:
    Fox Mulder
    See Also:
    IllegalCharset, ConstraintFactory.illegalCharset(String), ConstraintFactory.illegalCharset(UnicodeSet)
